Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.OOP.Property_

[docs]class NewProps:

    def __init__(self):
        self._age = 40


[docs]    def get_age(self):
        return self._age



[docs]    def set_age(self, value):
        print("Set age: ", value)
        self._age = value


    age = property(get_age, set_age, None, None)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    x = NewProps()
    print(x.age)
    x.age = 2
    print(x.age)
